There are only two things in the Toolbar Plugin that would cause KSP to switch to the desktop (and into a browser, actually):

- The "update available" notification button.

- The "About the Toolbar Plugin" menu item in the triangle button menu.

You have to click on either of these to cause it to switch to the browser. Other than that, the Toolbar Plugin is not causing the issue.
